about_the_game:
Welcome painter, to an afterlife not yet defined. An unshaped inferno awaiting your peculiar vision. Your tools are tiles inspired by the greatest masterpieces and surreal works of Renaissance masters. Will your canvas reflect torment, redemption, or something even stranger?

Shape a hell landscape of your own by combining tiles inspired by the works of Hieronymus Bosch and other Renaissance works. Uncover new tiles and express yourself fullest in the 'Creative Mode'

Would this endless task be your punishment—or your magnum opus? Challenge yourself in this tile placement mechanic inspired by classic board games such as Carcassonne with a unique twist: dark pacts that alter the very fabric of the game, offering unique combinations and challenges with every playthrough.

What shall be the fate of the damned? Is redemption possible, or is sin an eternal burden? Assist demons in their grim duty to judge sinners. Your choices will shape not just the canvas, but the very fate of your journey, unlocking upgrades retained for later sessions.

Watch out for the playable demo we are painting to be released in the 1st Trimester of 2025!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features scenes of violence, nudity, and sexual content, as many of its artworks are sourced from royalty-free paintings created centuries ago. To preserve their historical authenticity, these works are presented as faithfully as possible to their original form.
